function.name: generate_image
function.description: Create high-quality, customized images from detailed textual prompts. Supports multiple outputs and aspect ratio customization for precise visual storytelling.

prompt.description: A comprehensive, vivid description of the scene, mood, or idea you wish to visualize. With a maximum of **4,000 characters**, you have ample space to specify elements like environment, lighting, textures, emotions, and finer detailsâ€”allowing your imagination to run wild. The more detailed and inventive your description, the more your generated images will resonate with your original vision.

ratio.description: Selects the aspect ratio of the image: 'landscape' (wider than tall), 'portrait' (taller than wide), or 'square' (equal dimensions). Defaults to 'square' if omitted.

n.description: Number of images to generate for each prompt. Useful for exploring different interpretations or selecting the best fit. Note that higher values may increase resource usage.
